keyword: calories in green tea matcha latte
title: Calories in Green Tea Matcha Latte
meta_description: Learn calories in green tea matcha latte per serving, plus carbs, protein, fat, and tweaks for different milks or sweeteners.
h1: Calories in Green Tea Matcha Latte
assumptions: Standard 8 oz (240 ml) 2% milk with 1 tsp (2 g) matcha powder whisked in, no added sugar or syrup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type, matcha quality, portion size, and added ingredients like sweeteners. Check recipes or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of green tea matcha latte provides ~130 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a green tea matcha latte?
faqs.a: About 130 kcal for one 8 oz serving with 2% milk and no added sugar.

faqs.q: Does matcha latte have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: Base version has ~12 g natural sugars from milk; added sweeteners increase it.

faqs.q: What's the protein in matcha latte?
faqs.a: Around 9 g per serving, mostly from the milk.
Yes, ~17 g carbs per serving, but varies with milk choice.

faqs.q: How does milk type affect calories in matcha latte?
faqs.a: Skim milk lowers to ~110 kcal, whole milk raises to ~160 kcal per serving.
